code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a white female aged 41 Ys c/o 4 days h/o moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments. NKDA. o:Height 59 in, Weight 97 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed prednisone - 60 mg daily, and ordered pure tone audiometry.

s:a 42 YO white female ornithologist presents with 2 days history of moderate pain and discharge in ear, moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments and moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear. o:Height 59 in, Weight 96 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed gabapentin - 1800 mg daily, and ordered pure tone audiometry.
